revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C5 |revision=v1.20 |series=AC1200 |asin= |price=60 |image1=ArcherC5_V1_front.jpg |image1_size=200px |est_release_date=06/25/2014 |fcc_date=07/14/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C5 |ic_id=8853A-C5 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FV |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, JP4 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Qualcomm Atheros CUS223 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 241JW, 1341 MY;3; |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;ap135; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_2.4GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,, ^TP-LINK_5GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=1C:FA:68,EC:26:CA |oui_eth=1C:FA:68,EC:26:CA }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/Archer-C5_V1.20.html Support page] *"2050500332" is silkscreened on the main board in the [https://fccid.io/TE7C5/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-2322724 FCC photos]. *"2052500400" is silkscreened on the back of the wireless module. *"2050500351" is silkscreened on the main board in the users photos. [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer-c5-c7-wdr7500 ''TP-LINK Archer C5/C7'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32651-ac1200-router-roundup-part-1?showall=&start=3 On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"The only difference between the C5 v1 and C7 v1 is the 5GHz maximum :link rate is limited to 867Mbps on the C5 vs. 1300 Mbps on the C7. :The 2.4 GHz radio link rate isn't capped, so it will link at 217/450Mbps :(20/40MHz bandwidth) when used with a 3x3 2.4 GHz client." *[http://www.profesionalreview.com/2014/08/27/review-tp-link-archer-c5/ On '''ProfesionalReview'''] (in Spanish, photos of board) :The unit appears to be identical to the [[TP-LINK Archer C7 v2.x]] :([http://forum.tp-link.com/showthread.php?80222-Archer-V1.2-VS-V2 Archer C5 V1.2 vs V2], [http://blog.naver.com/ckdalsdk12/40208033303 internal photos ''Archer C7 v2'']) ==Images== File:ArcherC5_V1_front.jpg File:ArcherC5_V1_rear.jpg [[Has images::external| ]] __NOTOC__
